title: The coolest loft in the Marina Arts District
posting_body: Located in the highly desirable & vibrant Marina Arts District, this 2 bedroom 2 bath loft style unit is absolutely gorgeous!
It boasts a sophisticated industrial style open floor plan with soaring 20ft ceilings and floor to ceiling windows that flood the unit with natural light.
The chefs kitchen features custom cabinets, quartz countertops & stainless steel appliances.
Each floor has an open style bedroom with its own full bath.
Polished concrete floors, rich wood beams & designer light fixtures are just some of the items that add a truly unique taste to this property.
To request a showing please reply with the date and time you would like to see the unit and the best number / email to contact you so we can confirm the appointment.
marina del rey, marina arts district , silicon beach, mar vista, loft district, loft for lease, loft for rent
